title: DOM XSS at `https://adobedocs.github.io/OAE_PartnerAPI/?configUrl={site}` due to outdated Swagger UI

profile.name: Adobe
profile.about: Adobe Vulnerability Disclosure Program and Magento Bug Bounty Program

summaries.content: The researcher responsibly disclosed a DOM XSS finding on an Adobe asset. We appreciate the collaboration and we're waiting for more quality reports like this one from him on HackerOne.

Swagger UI has an interesting feature that allows you to provide a URL to API specification - a yaml or json file that will be fetched and displayed to the user.
To do that you have to add a query parameter `?url=https://your_api_spec/spec.yaml` or `?configUrl=https://your_api_spec/file.json`
